abstract: The bank gave Jamie Dimon, its chief executive, a $5 million cash bonus for last year; he received no cash bonus for 2009.
snippet: The bank gave Jamie Dimon, its chief executive, a $5 million cash bonus for last year; he received no cash bonus for 2009.
lead_paragraph: JPMorgan Chase paid Jamie Dimon, its chief executive, a total of $20.8 million last year, a substantial increase from $1.3 million he received in 2009, the bank disclosed on Thursday afternoon in a regulatory filing.
